definition: expanse of water/ooze/(onom.) bark/classifier for liquids: pool, puddle

sentences.english: Books are lighthouses erected in the great sea of time.
sentences.chinese: 是在时间的汪洋大海中屹然矗立的灯塔。

sentences.english: PS Wang meeting: Ambassador Huntsman called on Party Secretary Wang Yang and Mayor Wan at Zhudao this morning.
sentences.chinese: 大使今晨在珠岛宾馆与省委书记汪洋及万市长会面。

sentences.english: The boat capsized in heavy seas.
sentences.chinese: 这只船在汪洋大海中倾覆了。

sentences.english: In the vacant sea, back and forth dominates ship's steering wheel.
sentences.chinese: 在茫茫然的汪洋，来回把持船的方向盘。

sentences.english: When I saw all that water, I was mesmerized!
sentences.chinese: 当看见那一片汪洋大海的时候，我整个人都惊呆了。

sentences.english: A frog in the well does not know the ocean .
sentences.chinese: 井底之蛙不知汪洋大海。

sentences.english: They bathe themselves in the bottomless, shoreless sea of infinite beatitude.
sentences.chinese: 他们在汪洋，深广无限的福乐大海中沐浴自己。

sentences.english: The sun dips into the ocean.
Sprawled out in the oceans, islands can paint many a strange picture.
sentences.chinese: 在汪洋中伸展蔓延，岛屿可以形成各种奇特画面。

sentences.english: The frog in well knows nothing of the great ocean.
sentences.chinese: 井底之蛙不知汪洋大海。

sentences.english: Never a mountain rocky and steep, Never a river turbid and deep.
sentences.chinese: 没有深水渠汪洋一片，没有大山阻高薄云天。

sentences.english: All aggressors will be drowned in the ocean of people's war.
sentences.chinese: 一切侵略者都将被淹没在人民战争的汪洋大海之中。

sentences.english: Being indecisive and hesitating, I'm like a ship in the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 因为徬徨犹豫，我像汪洋中的一条船。

definition: Dahu or Tahu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
hypo (loanword)/sodium thiosulfate Na2S2O3 used in fixing photos (formerly hyposulfite)/wave (sea)
